topic: libjpeg-turbo -- Issue in the PPM reader causing a buffer overrun in cjpeg, TJBench, or the tjLoadImage() function.

description.text:
libjpeg-turbo releases reports:

This release fixes the following security issue:

  • Heap-based buffer over-read in get_rgb_row() in rdppm.c via a malformed PPM input file.
